alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; Garfield; McCone; Northern Valley; Prairie; Richland; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 26 at 2:22PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following areas, Central and Southern Valley, Daniels, Dawson, Eastern Roosevelt, Garfield, McCone, Northern Valley, Prairie, Richland, Sheridan, Western Roosevelt and Wibaux. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - More showers and thunderstorms are expected through tonight. Any storms remaining over the same area for a long time may lead to flooding as they will likely contain heavy rain. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; Garfield; McCone; Northern Valley; Prairie; Richland; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt; Wibaux
